reviews.text: Food was tasty and service was stupendous. We were visiting from America and they were able to provide English menus, which I appreciated. Prices are on the higher end but if you’re looking for a nice meal out, this is worth it.

Excellent restaurant with an outstanding view of Liechtenstein!! We went there after watching the parade at of September 7th. There is plenty of space inside and outside, service is great, food was delicious and very friendly attendants. If you're driving, there is a parking lot right beside the restaurant that can accommodate around 12 cars and another in front for around 10 cars. Highly recommended!!

Wonderful Gaststätte in the mountains of Liechtenstein.

Only downside is the price. Be prepared for 50-60€ per plate.

I can recommend the place!
It is a bit pricey, but worth it!
Service and food is good (we had veal Cordon Bleu and soup with dumplings).
Prosecco based cocktails that we tried were great! Be careful, they are so tasty that it was hard to stop.
Additional point goes to the view. It is awesome.

Family and pet friendly restaurant on the side of a mountain. Great food, views, and service.  There’s a small area with children’s games.  They had dog water bowls for multiple tables (including ours).  No issues serving 4 adults and 2 children under 3 without a reservation.  Plenty of parking and the toilets are very clean.  Staff spoke English and German.
